div.p: Football Bourg-en-Bresse Péronnas 01 is a French association football team founded in 1942. They are based in Bourg-en-Bresse, Rhône-Alpes, France and play in Ligue 2, the second tier of the French football league system. They play at the Stade Municipal de Péronnas in Péronnas, which has a capacity of 3,500.
